original_title: ToxiCity: The story of Agbobloshie, a graveyard for electronics... and people
overview: Ghana is one of several African countries where electronic goods are sent once they have been discarded by developed nations. Agbogbloshie is an enormous dumping ground near Accra where digital appliances are dismantled for scrap.
title: ToxiCity: The story of Agbobloshie, a graveyard for electronics... and people
